title: How hard is PESSAT? Is 2 months of prep enough to get CSE in PES?
content: Class 12th student here and I just wanted to know the difficulty level of pessat, There’s about 2 months left for it and my boards didn’t go that well and I’ll pretty much be studying every topic again, so will 2 months of prep be enough for it?

comments.body:
Yeah, it will be. 
Honestly, spend those 2 months to prep for CET (if you're eligible, that is). Just keep one thing in mind. CSE is not an easy breeze as many people will have you believe. The management worships CSE and this creates a LOT of competition within students. It is a very unhealthy pressure that you deal with.

I cracked both xwt and pessat to get in RR campus but way back in 2019.
Pessat was all about speed and less about tough questions like jee mains

So if you solve pcm papers from cet with time bound simulaton for 2 months, you should be good.
Thanks for the reply guys, makes me a lot more confident
how was your pessat? also I'm in a bit worried heard its tough
